valr

Subtract intervals.

Subtract y intervals from x intervals.

bed_subtract(x, y, any = FALSE)

Arguments

x
tbl of intervals
y
tbl of intervals
any
remove any x intervals that overlap y

See also

http://bedtools.readthedocs.io/en/latest/content/tools/subtract.html

Other multi-set-ops: bed_closest, bed_coverage, bed_intersect, bed_map, bed_window

Examples 

x <- tibble::tribble(
~chrom, ~start, ~end,
'chr1', 1,      100
)

y <- tibble::tribble(
  ~chrom, ~start, ~end,
  'chr1', 50,     75
)

bed_glyph(bed_subtract(x, y))

x <- tibble::tribble(
 ~chrom, ~start, ~end,
 "chr1", 100,    200,
 "chr1", 250,    400,
 "chr1", 500,    600,
 "chr1", 1000,   1200,
 "chr1", 1300,   1500
)

y <- tibble::tribble(
 ~chrom, ~start, ~end,
 "chr1", 150,    175,
 "chr1", 510,    525,
 "chr1", 550,    575,
 "chr1", 900,    1050,
 "chr1", 1150,   1250,
 "chr1", 1299,   1501
)

bed_subtract(x, y)
#> # A tibble: 7 × 3
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <int> <int>
#> 1  chr1   100   150
#> 2  chr1   175   200
#> 3  chr1   250   400
#> 4  chr1   500   510
#> 5  chr1   525   550
#> 6  chr1   575   600
#> 7  chr1  1050  1150
#> 
bed_subtract(x, y, any = TRUE)
#> Source: local data frame [1 x 3]
#> Groups: chrom [1]
#> 
#>   chrom start   end
#>   <chr> <dbl> <dbl>
#> 1  chr1   250   400
#>
